title: The Tatooed Acrobat from Cuevas' Comedies
medium: Lithograph, screenprint, and embossing from a portfolio of ten lithographs (one with screenprint and embossing, one with embossing) and five screenprints (two double-sided, one with collage additions)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 30 1/16 x 22 7/16" (76.3 x 57 cm); sheet (slightly irreg.): 30 1/4 x 22 1/2" (76.8 x 57.2 cm)
